column5: Heading up in a couple weeks and I am curious about any delays or problems the construction may be causing. I checked the WI and MN DOT web pages to locate the areas of construction. Thanks, Terry

Just came south on that route Friday night and there were NO delays at all. Northbound a week early though there were two 15 minute delays just south of Intl. Falls due to repaving. That should all be completed by the time of your trip.Northbound Monday afternoon had an unusual 25-30 minute wait in line to go through Canadian customs. Southbound about 6 p.m. Friday there was NO wait to cross.Have a good trip. Leave just a few of those Eagle Lake/Vermilion Bay walleyes for the rest of us!
Thanks for the reply. I'm sure I won't catch them all!! lol
Narda, I am going up on Saturday. I will post an update. We both leave from the same place and pretty much go to the same area. I will let you know how the trip up is.

I would appreciate that, thanks, TerryI also found a couple of Apps for your smart phone that will notify you of construction and traffic delays, they are: 511 Minnesota and 511 Wisconsin.Have a GREAT trip!!!
I know for a fact you won't because I will be fishing your honey holes the week before ya .Maybe see ya Thurs. night for a couple
